org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

Class FallbackItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline.FallbackItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class FallbackItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    Item scorer that combines a primary scorer with a baseline. This scorer is comprised of two other scorers, a primary scorer and a baseline scorer. It first scores items using the primary scorer, and then consults the baseline scorer for any items that the primary scorer could not score.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public void score(long user,
                  @Nonnull
                  MutableSparseVector output)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        output - The score vector.
